name: Dottler
description: It barely moves, but it’s still alive. Hiding in its shell without food or water seems to have awakened its psychic powers.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its bug-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is increased.
abilities.description: Ups BUG moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their accuracy.  This ability has no effect on the one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold).  Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, the chance of a wild Pokémon holding a particular item is raised from 50%, 5%, or 1% to 60%, 20%, or 5%, respectively.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.effect: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.
abilities.description: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.
